legal.intellectualPropertyContent: All content on this site ‚Äì texts, images, logos, videos, design and code ‚Äì is the property of the association Attrape r√™ve. ‚ö†Ô∏è Please do not copy or use this content without our written permission.
legal.personalDataContent1: The only form available on this website is a contact form.
legal.personalDataContent2: The information submitted through this form is used solely to respond to the user's request and is neither stored nor reused for any other purpose.
legal.personalDataContent3: No personal data is kept beyond the time required to process the request.
legal.cookiesContent1: Used to improve navigation and measure audience. You can disable them in your browser settings.
legal.cookiesContent2: Your rights: access, modify, or delete your data.
legal.responsibilityContent: We do our best to ensure the site is reliable and up to date, but we cannot guarantee it is perfect at all times. Links to other sites are provided for information only, and the association is not responsible for their content.
legal.contactContent: For any legal questions or regarding the protection of your personal data, please contact olivia@okamifestival.com

home.title: OKAMI Festival 2026 ‚Äì Home
home.description: Welcome to the official website of the OKAMI Festival 2026 in Saint Christaud from 10 to 14 June. Discover its universe, programme, and activities.
home.keywords: OKAMI Festival 2026, home, programme, artists, concerts, Saint Christaud
home.ogDescription: All the information you need to fully enjoy the OKAMI Festival 2026 from 10 to 14 June in Saint Christaud!
